title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Creative Product Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles and fundamental understanding of product development processes
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate creative problem-solving skills combining product design theory and practice for learners with diverse professional backgrounds. Project-based learning design utilizing mobile-accessible learning modules and collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can apply the product design process step-by-step according to a given theme to design a concrete prototype (product/service).
Learners can improve design solutions at least twice through peer evaluation and feedback processes using mobile learning tools.
Learners can submit their design outcomes in portfolio format according to performance assessment criteria and pass a presentation evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
